item.title: MIUI OS2.0.121.0.VOLCNXM Recovery update for Redmi Turbo 4 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi Turbo 4 Pro China

Codename: onyx

Version: OS2.0.121.0.VOLCNXM | 15.0

Size: 7.9 GB

MD5: 834ed85d6d41ebf7e63685cf7b94e455

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Power consumption for Always-on display
Optimization: Battery usage and refresh rate for some games
Optimization: WLAN connection stability
Fix: Unexpected reboots occurred
Fix: Items were displayed incorrectly in some cases
[Themes]
Fix: Weather widget froze in some cases
[Camera]
Fix: Items weren't always displayed correctly in Camera's Pro mode

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
